title: The Village
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 1,298 words, Level U (Grade 4), Lexile 800L, Fiction Series
description: In the next installment of the Hollow Kids series, Sarah and Jake find themselves in a strange place. They can't find Odie or Qynn, and they don't know where they are. Their best option is to go toward the lights in the distance. The Village continues the adventures of these familiar characters while providing opportunities for students to practice analyzing character and using coordinate adjectives.
